data.eml:eml: Hypsibius vaskelae, a new species of Tardigrada (Eutardigrada, Hypsibiidae) from Russia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tumanov, Denis V. (2018): Hypsibius vaskelae, a new species of Tardigrada (Eutardigrada, Hypsibiidae) from Russia. Zootaxa 4399 (3): 434-442, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4399.3.12
